name: GeneralMattisQuotes
0:
”Alexa, General Mattis.”
”Alexa, tell me a quote by General Mattis.”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: general mattis
des:
These are all real life quotes by General "Mad Dog" Mattis!
Just say "Alexa, General Mattis." or "Alexa, tell me a quote by General Mattis." or "Alexa, ask General Mattis to tell me something." It's that easy!!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
